reviews.review:
Really addictive and well-balanced gameplay
A huge variety of perks and skills makes this game a great sandbox
Also gives room for imagination on the topic of new possible characters

Some things can be controversial, but I personally get pleasure and interest in the game.
this game is perfect and so fun, even though its old its still very fun to play and you can get into a game fast

Be aware to buy this game if you have any heart diseas, it may contain a lethal amount of salt.

its a fun game once you figure out the maps and how to actually play. this game does have a learning curve. Not a fan of the match making system they have in place and everyone resets on the 13th of every month. Understand this game has been out for about 5 years or so what i know. So for a new player it can be quite intimidating to get started. I HIGHLY recommend you watch videos on survivor or killer and learn the many tips and tricks to get you a success on what you decide to do with this game.

the true horror was the friends we made along the way,

This game tests how well you manage your priorities in order for you to win, either working  together with other survivors or squaring up against a them as a Killer, Greatly recommend for asemetrical Multiplayer enjoyers

Das Spiel an sich ist super! Ich habe nur ein Problem mit den Updates, denn es sind immer sehr kleine Updates (z.B. 70MB), die auch schnell installieren. Danach werden aber immer so um die 30GB an Daten verschoben, was dann sehr lange dauert. Kann man das irgendwie deaktivieren? Ich habe im Internet nichts gefunden, deshalb frage ich hier. Vielleicht hat ja jemand das selbe Problem und kann mir helfen. Danke :D

Tr√®s bon jeu, quelques tueurs et survivants toxiques en game mais sinon c'est un super jeu. Je conseille de jouer en team.
good game i like it less cheaters than old times 9/10 star for this game!

Will never play again. Veteran survivors are losing to noob killers. This whole game is designed in favor of killers. Buffed all killer perks so all are over powered and reduced all survivor perks. Worst community ever. Toxic and pathetic players working with killers and or hacking. Nope, done. This is a trash game designed by pathetic developers that don't listen to anyone other than killer mains.

I do enjoy playing dead by daylight ive played a lot of hours on Ps4 and now trying PC , i think there is alot of cool cosmetics and i like all the maps and killers. Also new updates are nice to have. Negatives of the game would be hackers unfortunately, when reporting nothing much is done. Toxicity from people playing the game which i didn't realise it was anything like this till about 2 months into the game, which has nothing to do with the game itself , i just turn my chat off. There is not much else to say if you like survival games multiplayer then you will like dbd.
